title: Kid-Friendly Turkey Meatloaf Muffins (Blended Veggie Version)
description: Healthy turkey meatloaf muffins with hidden vegetables, perfect for kids and meal prep
ingredients: 2 lbs lean ground turkey (or chicken breast if you prefer)
1 tsp dried Italian herbs (or ½ tsp oregano + ½ tsp basil)
instructions: Prep veggies: In a food processor, blend onion, carrot, kale/spinach, celery, and garlic until finely minced (like a wet paste).
If kids are sensitive to 'green' flavor, sauté this veggie paste 2–3 min in a pan with a splash of olive oil before mixing in.
In a big bowl, combine turkey, blended veggie mix, oats, eggs, herbs, salt, and pepper. Mix gently until combined (don't overwork).
Spoon into a lightly greased 12-cup muffin tin. Smooth tops.
Stir glaze ingredients together and spread ~1 tsp over each muffin.
Bake for 22–25 minutes, until internal temp hits 165°F.
notes: Makes ~12 muffins. Nutrition per muffin (approx): Calories: ~135, Protein: ~13g, Fat: ~5g, Carbs: ~8g, Fiber: ~2–3g, Vitamin A: ~35% DV (from carrots), Vitamin K & folate: boosted from greens.
